definitions.definition: A picture made by sticking other pictures onto a surface or juxtaposing them digitally in analogous manner.
A composite object or collection (abstract or concrete) created by the assemblage of various media ; especially for a work of art such as text , film , etc.
examples: Richard Brautigan's novel So the Wind Won't Blow It All Away is a collage of memories.
So the Wind Won't Blow It All Away

definitions.definition: The technique or method of producing a work of art of this kind.

main_definition: A picture made by sticking other pictures onto a surface or juxtaposing them digitally in analogous manner.
secondary_definitions: A composite object or collection (abstract or concrete) created by the assemblage of various media ; especially for a work of art such as text , film , etc.
( uncountable ) The technique or method of producing a work of art of this kind.
